resources.string: This is an esports quiz app
Test your knowledge now and gain XP
Reset your highscore or read some information about the app here
Welcome to XP! A esports quiz app I developed, that quizzes users on everything relating to esports and its respective games.
XP has categories from esports all over the esports scene. Anything from Counter Strike, League of Legends all the way up to new titles like Valorant.
Hi, my name is Wiaan Duvenhage! \n I am a 2nd year full-stack developer student \n at The Open Window.
What do you think about XP? I hope you enjoyed playing the game and learned something about esports from different games.
